lines: bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro chos skyong dang
yul lha gzhi bdag gnas bdag dkor bdag rnams
zhal zas tshogs la gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol
bdag dang rgyu sbyor sbyin pa'i bdag po rnams
bsod nams ye shes tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa dang
'gal rkyen bar chad ma lus bsal slad du
brtse ba'i thugs kyis gshegs shing bzhugs su gsol
sa phyogs 'di la byin gyis brlab tu gsol
oM las gyur pa'i ye shes ka pA lar
sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga yi rang bzhin can
'dod yon lnga ldan tshogs kyi mchod pa 'di
khyab bdag bla ma rdo rje 'jigs byed dang
ye shes mkha' 'gro la li ta badzra
sha wa ri sogs rtsa brgyud bla ma la
mchod do 'bul lo tshogs kyi mchod pa bzhes
yi dam kun 'dus bcom ldan gshin rje'i gshed
ro langs ma dang gti mug mthar byed sogs
dkyil 'khor lha tshogs phyogs skyong bco lnga la
mchod do 'bul lo tshogs kyi mchod pa bzhes
yi shes mgon po ma hA ka la dang
dpal ldan lha mo bka' gnyan gnod sbyin bzhi
dam can rgya mtsho'i tshogs dang bcas pa la
mchod do 'bul lo tshogs kyi mchod pa bzhes
dam can gshin rje chos kyi rgyal po dang
ma mo chen mo yum chen tsA mun tri
pho brgyad mo brgyad 'khor dang bcas pa la
mchod do 'bul lo tshogs kyi mchod pa bzhes
'dod khams dbang phyug dpal ldan dmag zor ma
'phrin las bsgrub mdzad dus bzhi'i lha mo dang
gdug pa'i 'khor tshogs rgya mtshor bcas pa la
mchod do 'bul lo tshogs kyi mchod pa bzhes
tshe ring mched lnga bstan ma bcu gnyis dang
kong btsun de mo sprul pa'i chos rgyal sogs
gnas bdag dkor bdag yul lha bzhi bdag la
mchod do 'bul lo tshogs kyi mchod pa bzhes
bla ma rgya mtsho tshogs la rol
mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho tshogs la rol
chos skyong rgya mtsho tshogs la rol
la la phyi yi tshogs la rol
la la nang gi tshogs la rol
bzhes shig rol cig kha raM khA hi
bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro dang
chos skyong srung ma thams cad la
phul ba'i rnal 'byor yon mchod kun
mchog thun dngos grub ma lus pa
myur du thob pa'i 'phrin las mdzod
ces sogs kyis tshogs phud phul
khro bo'i dbang po bcom ldan gshin rje'i gshed
rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i zhal dgu ru
mchod do 'bul lo a la la ho zhes
rang gi rgyud kyi dug lnga rnam dag pa'i
ye shes lnga ldan sku lnga'i bdag nyid can
gshin rje'i gshed po rigs lnga'i lha tshogs la
mchod do 'bul lo a la la ho zhes
rang gi rgyud kyi bdud bzhi rnam dag pas
khro bo tho ba dbyug pa padma dang
ral gri gshin rje'i gshed kyi lha tshogs la
mchod do 'bul lo a la la ho zhes
rang gi lus kyi khams bzhi rnam dag pas
tsa tsi ka dang phag mo dbyangs can ma
gOo ri la sogs lha mo'i tshogs rnams la
mchod do 'bul lo a la la ho zhes
lhag gtor 'dod yon lnga ldan 'di
'od zer phyogs bcur 'phro ba yis
bdag cag yon mchod 'khor bcas la
gnod cing 'tshe ba'i nad gdon bgegs
bar du gcod pa gar gnas kyang
tshur 'dus lhag gtor 'di la thim
rnam pa dgra bgegs sha khrag 'di
dam can rgya mtsho dmag tshogs kyis
bzhes shig rol cig kha raM khA hi
nad gdon bar du gcod pa rnams
rdul phran bzhin du rlag par mdzod
lhag la re ba'i 'byung po rnams
'dod yon lnga ldan sha khrag 'dis
mnyes shing tshim nas bdag cag gi
bsam pa'i don kun 'grub par mdzod
gshin rje'i gshed kyi dkyil 'khor du
tshogs kyi 'khor lo bshams pa 'dis
bdag gzhan sems can ma lus pa
dkyil 'khor gcig tu 'grub par shog
